title: Homecoming
description: Abused from birth by the Xxan, the only thing Miri fears about her mating with Aleeks Daahn is meeting his gran-seir (grandfather). Daahn is a Xxannian Grae Elder, and all the elders she's met want her dead...or ended up dead themselves trying to kill her. Please enjoy this free look at what happened after CLOSE ENOUGH TO HUMAN, when Aleeks returned to his nest on Earth with his new mate.
author: Brenna Lyons
